Plot: Story of two girls who wander away from a White House tour and meet President Nixon.
Title: Dick
Actors: Kirsten Dunst, Michelle Williams, Dan Hedaya, Will Ferrell
tomatoConsensus: A clever, funny slice of alternate history, Dick farcically re-imagines the Watergate era and largely succeeds, thanks to quirky, winning performances from Michelle Williams, Kirsten Dunst and Will Ferrell.
